verses.verse: Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> was gathered <S%H6950>together<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> from <S%H4480>Dan<s%> <S%H1835><s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H884>Beer-sheba,<s%> with the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpeh.<s%>

And the <S%H6438>chief<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> presented <S%H3320>themselves<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>footmen<s%> <S%H7273><s%> that <S%H8025>drew<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

(Now the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpeh.)<s%> Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1696>Tell<s%> us, <S%H349>how<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness?<s%>

And the <S%H376>Levite,<s%> <S%H3881><s%> the <S%H376>husband<s%> of the <S%H802>woman<s%> that was <S%H7523>slain,<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> belongeth to <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> and my <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> to <S%H3885>lodge.<s%>

And the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and beset the house round <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H1819>thought<s%> to have <S%H2026>slain<s%> me: and my <S%H6370>concubine<s%> have they <S%H6031>forced,<s%> that she is <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

And I <S%H270>took<s%> my <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> and cut her in <S%H5408>pieces,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> her throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> ye are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3051>give<s%> <S%H1988>here<s%> your <S%H1697>advice<s%> and <S%H6098>counsel.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> We will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> of us <S%H1980>go<s%> to his <S%H168>tent,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will we <S%H376>any<s%> of us <S%H5493>turn<s%> into his <S%H1004>house.<s%>
But <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we will <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah;<s%> we will go up by <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it;

And we will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> of a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> out of ten <S%H7233>thousand,<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> <S%H6720>victual<s%> for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they may <S%H6213>do,<s%> when they <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1387>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5039>folly<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they have <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> knit <S%H2270>together<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

And the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H1961>done<s%> among you?

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H853>us<s%> the <S%H376>men,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> that we may put them to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and put <S%H1197>away<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> from <S%H4480>Israel.<s%> <S%H3478><s%> But the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of their <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

But the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> unto <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> to go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> out of the <S%H4480>cities<s%> <S%H5892><s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H8025>drew<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> the <S%H4480>inhabitants<s%> <S%H3427><s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> which were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H970>chosen<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

Among <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> there were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H334>left-handed;<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H3225><s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H2088><s%> could <S%H7049>sling<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> a <S%H8185>hair<s%> breadth, and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2398>miss.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> <S%H4480>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H1144><s%> were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H8025>drew<s%> <S%H2719>sword:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> were <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the house of <S%H1008>God,<s%> and asked <S%H7592>counsel<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Which<s%> of us shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H8462>first<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin?<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall go up <S%H8462>first.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> put themselves in <S%H6186>array<s%> to <S%H4421>fight<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> them <S%H413>at<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> and destroyed <S%H7843>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> of the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> encouraged <S%H2388>themselves,<s%> and <S%H6186>set<s%> their <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> in <S%H6186>array<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they put themselves in <S%H6186>array<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

(And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>even,<s%> and asked <S%H7592>counsel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Shall I go <S%H5066>up<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> my <S%H251>brother?<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> him.)
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> them out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> down to the <S%H776>ground<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8025>drew<s%> the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> unto the house of <S%H1008>God,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>even,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> (for the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H8033>there<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%>

And <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> it in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,)<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Shall I <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> my <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> shall I <S%H2308>cease?<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Go <S%H5927>up;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> liers in <S%H693>wait<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and put themselves in <S%H6186>array<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> as at other <S%H6471>times.<s%> <S%H6471><s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and were drawn <S%H5423>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and they <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H5221>smite<s%> of the <S%H4480>people,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> and <S%H2491>kill,<s%> as at other <S%H6471>times,<s%> <S%H6471><s%> in the <S%H4546>highways,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> to the house of <S%H1008>God,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> about <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1992>They<s%> are smitten <S%H5062>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us, as at the <S%H7223>first.<s%> But the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us <S%H5127>flee,<s%> and <S%H5423>draw<s%> them <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4546>highways.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> out of their <S%H4480>place,<s%> <S%H4725><s%> and put themselves in <S%H6186>array<s%> at <S%H1193>Baal-tamar:<s%> and the liers in <S%H693>wait<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H1518>forth<s%> out of their <S%H4480>places,<s%> <S%H4725><s%> even out of the <S%H4480>meadows<s%> <S%H4629><s%> of <S%H4480>Gibeah.<s%> <S%H1390><s%>

And there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H4480>against<s%> <S%H5048><s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> was <S%H3513>sore:<s%> but <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> was <S%H5060>near<s%> them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5062>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> of the <S%H1144>Benjamites<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8025>drew<s%> the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

So the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they were <S%H5062>smitten:<s%> for the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> to the <S%H1144>Benjamites,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H982>trusted<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the liers in <S%H693>wait<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H413>beside<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%>
